Policy.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
Policy.introductionContent: We at the booking platform care about your privacy and data security. This policy aims to clarify how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website and services. Please read this policy carefully.

infoCollectionList.registration: Registration information: Includes name, phone number, and email you provide when creating an account.
infoCollectionList.bookingTransactions: Booking and transaction data: Details related to services you book, including service provider, timing, and any special notes.
infoCollectionList.deviceLocation: Device and location information: We may collect information about the device you use to access our platform (such as device type, operating system) and your approximate geographic location when necessary to provide services.
infoCollectionList.usageData: Usage data: Information about how you interact with our website, such as pages you visit and time spent.

infoUsageList.serviceProvision: Service provision: To manage your bookings, facilitate communication between you and service providers, and provide technical support.
infoUsageList.experienceImprovement: Experience improvement: To improve platform functionality and user experience, and customize content and offers.
infoUsageList.legalCompliance: Legal compliance: To comply with legal and regulatory requirements, and protect our rights and those of our users.
infoUsageList.communication: Communication: To send updates about your services, appointment notifications, and promotional messages (with opt-out option).

Policy.dataProtectionContent: We are committed to protecting your personal data. We use the latest encryption technologies (such as SSL/TLS), physical and electronic security procedures, and secure storage to protect your data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction. Our security procedures are regularly reviewed and updated.

userRightsList.accessModification: Right to access and modification: You can access and update your personal data through your account settings.
userRightsList.deletion: Right to deletion: You can request deletion of your account and personal data, subject to legal requirements and retention of necessary data.
userRightsList.objection: Right to objection: You have the right to object to processing of your personal data for certain reasons.
userRightsList.notifications: Right to receive notifications: You will be notified of any security breaches that may affect your data.

Policy.amendmentsContent: We may update this policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal or regulatory reasons. You will be notified of any significant changes through a prominent notice on our website or via email (if appropriate) before the changes become effective.
Policy.contactUsContent: For any inquiries or requests related to your privacy or this policy, please contact us via email:
